Storybooks

×

Storybooks is an online diary maintaining application that allows users to maintain diary on the go. The user can write private, public and unpublished posts. All you need is a google account to get started.

Project Github
Project Github

Lumos

×

Lumos is a smart city traveler application. The user just needs to specify his likings and a time range, the application then returns the details of all the places within the given travelling time with the directions to the place.

Project Github
Project Github

PostIt

×

PostIt is a blogging application that allows user to add, edit and delete posts. The application uses the MVC approach and Bootstrap.

Project Github

Blog

×

Blog is a blogging platform that allows users to write and share blogs. The apllication allows users to follows other users whose blogs will appear in their feed.

Vidjot

×

Vidjot is an application that allows users to jot down ideas for future ideas. The users can add, edit and delete their ideas.

Project Github

GitHubFinder

×

Github Finder displays the Github Profile of a user based on the searched username. All the repositories, forks, followers, followed and other profile information is displayed.

Project Github
Project Github

MovieFinder

×

MovieFinder displays a list of movies based on searched keywords. It also displays the IMDB rating, actors, plot, duration and all other information related to a movie. The application lets you find the right movie for the right mood and interest.

Project Github
Project Github

Bookmarker

×

Bookmarker lets you bookmark important websites and webpages. The application uses local storage to store the bookmarked websites.
